text:
ITPC | Princeton, NJ | Contract | ONSITE (no VISA) | $36 - 150k (profit sharing)

Our small company provides a broad range of information technology products and solutions to local community.

We are looking for a software/hardware specialist who likes to interact with real customers and solve real problems.

For questions or to submit resumes, please send an email to my personal gmail address: leralom

I am responsible for hiring and will make sure that your time is not wasted. No recruiters please.

73
